name: Vshop Solutions Pvt. Ltd.
overview:
Boikart.com is solely owned by Vshop Solutions Pvt. Ltd. Vshop Solutions Pvt. Ltd is registered with Kolkata Jurisdiction, West Bengal, India With an inventory of half million books, Boikart is a gold mine for book lovers. We have not stopped adding more books to this vast collection. We are increasing our inventory day by day. Our aim to make a portal so strong that you can find each and every book ever published. As books could be our best friend, we know this is a huge responsibility on us. We want to take this responsibility willfully and with great pleasure to serve you better.

Not only the inventory, we also provide best discounts in the market and avail it with least price to start and end your search here.

Our robust back office support will always ensure on time delivery of the books you have purchased. For any delay you will be duly informed. If we cannot find any book in the market, it is our responsibility to let you know.

Cash on delivery facility can be availed by urban people in many sites. But, we see no difference in urban and rural customers. That’s why we are the first one to start the “Cash on delivery” in rural areas as well. In pilot phase we may not be able to cover all pin codes in West Bengal, eventually we will make it.

We are always open to your suggestions - be it improvement of our service or your grievance. Please feel free to email to us in info@boikart.com or call us at +91 9007911567 or +91 33 65652265.
